short_description: robertson roofing is a roofing contractor based in solihull, united kingdom.
long_description: robertson roofing ltd is a leading and reputable national roofing contractor with offices in the west midlands, and south west of england. principally specialising in the supply and installation of lightweight single-ply insulated flat roofing systems, composite membrane weathered roof panels and associated wall systems. the company was established in 1972 by mr alec robertson with the intention to develop the newly emerging single-ply membrane roofing market. we are also involved with local authorities school projects, health care and hospital developments. our reputation within the industry has resulted in the establishment of many long-term working relationships and repeat business with major clients.

generated_description: robertson roofing, legally known as robertson roofing ltd., is a roofing contractor based in bristol, england, established in 1972 by mr. alec robertson. the company specializes in the supply and installation of lightweight single-ply insulated flat roofing systems, composite membrane weathered roof panels, and associated wall systems. is recognized for being the first major roofing contractor to introduce single-ply membranes as an alternative to traditional hot-applied felt roofing systems. the company has extensive experience, having installed over 6 million square meters of single-ply roofing systems, including notable projects such as meadowhall shopping centre, sheffield north terminal, and various tesco and wm morrisons supermarkets. is committed to safety and has a comprehensive safety training plan to ensure the health and safety of its employees.
